0a85eb3a1c6d6fe7b9cd8cc3a0c93718 (02:17): Hyperspace is the region in the NT Memory address space before the blackhole
0a85eb3a1c6d6fe7b9cd8cc3a0c93718 (02:18): the blackhole is a memory address that eats any writes/reads to it
